answers.answer: HiI am not sure whether you stated this medication on your own or were advised to take it for weight loss. The drug has many side effects. A good dietician should be able to come up with a diet plan based on your body metabolism and stature o help you reduce weight.Please think carefully before resorting to medication as the way to reduce weight. Consult the physician first, especially if your vision problems began after you started taking Topamax.
